description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Central, Hong Kong. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Sky-High Hong Kong Designer Suites
hotels.description: Float among the clouds with an escape to The Putman, a sky-scraping luxury hotel designed by the late illustrious interior designer, Andrée Putman. The boutique urban retreat sits above the bustling neighbourhoods of Sheung Wan and Soho in the heart of Hong Kong, offering an oasis of calm amid the area’s ancient temples, stylish restaurants and lively nightlife. They will be no doubting which city you’re in from your suite - floor-to-ceiling windows with spectacular views come standard. Offering a truly luxurious home-away-from-home experience, the contemporary full-floor suites feature a living room, fully equipped kitchen, master bedroom and stylish ensuite with bathtub. While your suite should have everything you need for a sensational stay, the 24-hour front desk is on hand for anything else.

seo.title: Hotel a Central - Hong Kong Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Central, Hong Kong con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
